title: Sunny spacious 2 BR+/1.5 bath in residential neighborhood
posting_body: ['Beautiful spacious 2 BR+/1.5 bath apartment in a sunny residential neighborhood on Broadway.', '$2, 500/month', 'Large freshly renovated first-floor apartment with flexible floor plan, restored vintage woodwork throughout, and all new raised panel, pine doors.', 'Bright, sunny kitchen 13 x 15 feet with 6 x 8 foot pantry with plenty of shelving and storage, new laminate maple floors, 4 big windows, ceiling light, includes refrigerator, glass top stove, microwave, maple wood kitchen table with leaf available for use.', 'Grande Room #1 12 x 16 feet, 9 foot ceiling, built-in cabinet, hardwood floor, 5 large almost floor to ceiling windows, ceiling plaster pendant light.', 'Grande Room #2 13 x 15 feet, 9 foot ceiling, 4 large almost floor to ceiling windows, hardwood floor, ceiling plaster pendant light with fan.', 'Grand Room #2 has a 9 x 11 foot extra room with freshly shampooed carpet, with closet and a window.', 'Room #3 12 x 13 feet, 9 foot ceiling, with closet, hardwood floors, one almost floor to ceiling window, ceiling plaster pendant light with fan.', 'Room #4 12 x 14 feet, 9 foot ceiling, hard floors, one almost floor to ceiling window, ceiling plaster pendant light', 'Half bath off Room #3 is 4 x 4 feet, 9 foot ceiling, hardwood floor.', 'Full Bath is 8 x 9 feet, newly renovated, tiled tub with shower, full linen closet, big window', 'Private large back-hallway has 3 closets and several additional storage shelves.', ' Use of backyard', '2 off street parking in driveway', 'Washer/dryer hookup in basement, window ACs', 'Tenants pay for gas heat/hot water & electricity.', ' Water included.', 'No smoking and no pets, please', 'First, last, and $2,000 security deposit is required.', 'Application and proof of income are required.']
